Package org.hibernate.shards.query

Interface Summary
QueryEvent Interface for events that can be lazily applied to a Query.
QueryFactory  
ShardedQuery ShardedQuery extends the Query interface to provide the ability to query across shards.
 

Class Summary
AdHocQueryFactoryImpl  
ExitOperationsQueryCollector Exit operations for queries is essentially not implemented.
NamedQueryFactoryImpl Facilitates use of named queries when using ShardedQuery.
